Package src.database

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.database.Database
  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    Database model to read and write serialized data into .dat files.
    Since:
    2022-03-28

      • readSerializedObject

        public static boolean readSerializedObject​(FileType fileType)
        A method to read serialized object from a particular FileType.
        Parameters:
        fileType - file type to be read.
        Returns:
        true if read from file is successful. Otherwise, false.

      • writeSerializedObject

        public static boolean writeSerializedObject​(FileType fileType)
        A method to write serialized object to file.
        Parameters:
        fileType - file type to write into.
        Returns:
        true if write to file is successful. Otherwise, false.

      • clearDatabase

        public static boolean clearDatabase()
        A method to clear out all the data in database.
        Returns:
        true if data is cleared successfully.

      • initializeDummyGuests

        public static boolean initializeDummyGuests()
        A method to initialize Guest dummy data when the database is empty.
        Returns:
        true if initialized successfully.

      • initializeDummyMenu

        public static boolean initializeDummyMenu()
        A method to initialize MenuItem dummy data when the database is empty.
        Returns:
        true is initialied successfully.
